response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and excellence. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in superior craftsmanship and unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and the dedication that went into its creation, we believe it is worth more than $1,000,000 to us. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. We understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so please consider this offer thoughtfully. Should you have any questions or require further information, feel free to reach out to us. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
